text: 21.24: Esr 9.7; Sng 79.1; Ais 63.18; Ro 11.25; VB 11.2Mba tugen kha Isreran ki gumgi gu mbigi, mben pani gumgi, mbe zɨv, mbe thari fhɨri gorɨrim, mbe vhɨzgirga. Mbe thari ndiv za kha nuianan ki ŋguir ŋgɨrim, mbe mben ŋaara gumgi kɨrga. Mba harigi fhain ntɨɨri maaŋ mben muuŋv, mbe vhɨra Zerusarem ŋgu bakɨme ndigip, guigira ana farfagirga. Mbe ana farfagip kɨvkɨrim, Fhe Bakɨme mba mbe sarigi tuk vhɨzgirga.”
